column15: 2015) send sympathy card graveside services for myrtle mc. cullough will be held at 3:00 p. m. on sunday
column17: 2015 at the big cane baptist cemetery with the bro. brian johnston officiating. mrs. mc. cullough
column21: 2015 at her residence. she is preceded in death by her husband
column22: mac mc. cullough; and her parents
column23: john and alma jackson simpson. survivors include her two brothers
column24: floyd simpson and his wife jerri of big cane and vernon simpson and his wife juanita of big cane; her two sisters
column25: aline minniear and her husband tom of baton rouge and mary stagg and her husband phil of zachery; and numerous nieces and nephews. in lieu of flowers donation may be made to the big cane baptist church. online condolences may be sent to www. hixson-ducote. com print back 2010 - 2015 hixson-ducote funeral home 302 st john st.
